title: Russia and Ukraine accuse each other of attacking prison housing POWs
content:
1. Russia and Ukraine accuse each other of attacking prison housing POWs  CNN
  2. Russia claims 40 Ukrainian POWs killed in strike with US HIMARS, Ukraine decries 'brutal execution'  Fox News
  3. Ukraine, Russia trade blame for strike reportedly killing dozens of prisoners of war  NBC News
  4. "Azov" announces a hunt for everyone involved in mass murder of prisoners in Olenivka  Yahoo News
  5. Ukrainian soldiers killed in attack on Donetsk prison holding POWs, Russia says  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
